metadata.title: CVE-2016-0834 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - high
metadata.description: An unspecified media codec in mediaserver in Android 6.x before 2016-04-01allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial ofservice (memory corruption) via a crafted media file, aka internal bug26220548.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
